summary: I have overhauled the vampire gameplay in skyrim adding proper ranks and strength progression (both magic and melee, version 3 now includes vamp perks).
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTANT: v4.5 Dawnguard Required, however you must manually delete Vampireoverhaul.bsa file if its still in your skyrim data folder. If you don\'t remove this file the feed script will be bugged. You should only have VampireOverhaul.esp in your data folder, no .bsa file.

Non-Dawnguard Users: If you don\'t use Dawnguard use v4.3 found in the optional files section. on the nexus link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11487/

I have overhauled the vampire gameplay in skyrim adding proper ranks and strength progression (magic, bow & melee, includes vamp perks).

I\'m not actually working on this mod anymore. Version 4.3 is basically bug free. I can\'t see me adding anything else to this mod. I\'ve reduced the clutter of the .esp to keep possible conflicts to a minimum. I\'ll try and fix anything that beth updates break, but I doubt the patches will have any affect on it.

To any other modders out there who wish to use or improve upon this mod, contact me through message, keen to hear your ideas.

Thanks for the support, for my first mod i didn\'t expect to get many downloads at all. 


RANKS 
(ranks are based on number of \"necks bitten\" which is tracked in general stats)
-Newborn - +2% physical & destruction damage, +2% speed, +0.25% combat regen increase (regen per tick)
-Neonate(over 25bites) - +4% physical & destruction damage, +4% speed, +0.5% combat regen increase (regen per tick)
-Ancilla (over 50bites) - +6% physical & destruction damage, +6% speed, +0.75% combat regen increase (regen per tick)
-Ascendant (over 100bites) - +8% physical & destruction damage, +8% speed, +1% combat regen increase (regen per tick)
-Elder (over 200bites) - +10% physical & destruction damage, +10% speed, +1.25% combat regen increase (regen per tick)
-High Elder (over 500bites) - +12% physical & destruction damage, +12% speed, +1.5% combat regen increase (regen per tick)
-Ancient (over 1000bites) - +20% physical & destruction damage, +15% speed, +3% combat regen increase (regen per tick)

VAMPIRE PERKS (no perks version can be found in optional files)
(All perks require you to be a vampire)
Two hand - Vampire Overlord - Gives all 2h power attacks a 10% chance to proc a tremor causing 500 damage.
One hand - Vampire Duelist - Gives all 1h power attacks a 5% chance to proc a void causing 500 damage.
Bow - Vampire Deathdealer - Gives all bow shots a 5% chance to be infused causing 500 damage.
Destruction - Vampire Bloodmage - Provides FrostDrain channel spell: 30 frost, 30 health leach, 20 manapersec base. Both components of this spell scale with frost damage increasing effects, spell also benefits from deepfreeze perk and provides standard frost spell rundebuff.

VAMPIRE RESILIENCE 
(new vamparism buff, replacing some old ones)
- 100% resistance disease, 100% resistance poison, +100 carry strength

VAMPIRE HUNGER
(new vamparism stage system)
-Stage1 (Blood Filled)- +6% physical & destruction damage, 100% frost resistance, -25% fire resistance
-Stage2 (Sated)- +4% physical & destruction damage, 75% frost resistance, -50% fire resistance
-Stage3 (Hungry)- +2% physical & destruction damage, 50% frost resistance, -75% fire resistance
-Stage4 (Starving)- 25% frost resistance, -100% fire resistance, Blood Sense Spell added

SUNLIGHT SYSTEM
-Stage1 - No vitals regen, -15 vitalstats, (Ascendant and above are immune to regen debuff)
-Stage2 - No vitals regen, -30 vitalstats, (Elder and above are immune to regen debuff)
-Stage3 - No vitals regen, -45 vitalstats, (High Elder and above are immune to regen debuff)
-Stage4 - NPCs are hostile, No vitals regen, -60 vitalstats, (Ancients are immune to regen debuff)

GENERAL CHANGES
-Vampires can feed on fresh corpses
-Vampires can breath underwater
-Dreadcloak buff unlocked for all stages
-Vampire Seduction calms up to lvl 50, spell added to all stages
-Vampiric Drain absorbs 20/15/10/5
-Vampire\'s Sight Sight is a toggle
-Embrace of Shadows has muffle effect, spell added to all stages
-Vampire Servant can be raised from up to a lvl 80 corpse with infinite duration
-Sunlight affects vampires from 6am to 7pm
-Blood sense spell is available at stage 4
-Champion of the Night has been combined with Vampiric Blood Affinity
-Vampire Female Eyefix for human races

NOTE: If you are already a vampire you will need to advance vamparism 1 stage (not feed for a bit) and then feed to get the updated skills etc. Ensure you have a clean save if you have used previous vamp mods.

CREDIT:
undomir - for allowing me to make use of his vampire feed script.

RECOMMENDED:
Great house mod Deus Mons- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11803
Burnt vampire face texture fix http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1148
BOSS improves mod compatibility http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6
.bsa and loose texture file optimiser http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12801 (this program literally dropped my VRAM usage by 30% and reduced my random CTD due to VRAM spikes to 0)

TRANSLATIONS:
Andre7890 has made an italian translation of this mod found at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11831
Gin14x12 has made a german translation of this mod found at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14098
Guchi777 has made a russian translation of this mod found at http://modgames.net/load/247-1-0-11602
Obla has made a spanish translation of this mod found at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18809

This is my first mod, rate it if you like it. My modding knowledge is limited, i\'ve debugged it and found no issues. However, if you find problems or have suggestions leave posts and I\'ll try and do what i can. Thanks

CHANGELOG
Version 4.5 - Fixed Stage 1 Seduction to match new seduction, fixed vampire sunlight occuring after Eclipse
Version 4.4 - I\'ve made an effort to make this Dawnguard compatible, I removed corpse feeding as i no longer feel it is necessary with the much cooler seduction feed system.
Version 4.3 - Fixed new vamp Waterbreathing bug.
Version 4.2 - Found a way to tidy a lot of loose forms and generally clean up the .esp file.
Version 4.1 - Added support for custom race / vanilla non vampire races, redone spell stages.
Version 4.0 - Added Marksman support, all buffs now increase bow too & bow vampire perk added.
Version 3.4 - Added Script to limit feeding to once per corpse, custom race support.
Version 3.3 - Updated to improve compatibility with Vampire FX mod.
Version 3.2 - Minor text update made, fixed requirements for 2h vamp perk.
Version 3.1 - Lowered 1h proc rate to 5% to fall more in line with its swing times.
Version 3.0 - Added Vampire perks to 2h, 1h and destruction trees. Renamed Thrall to Newborn.
Version 2.2 - Fixed Stage 2 Sun magicka regen.
Version 2.1 - Updated Blood Affinity Display Text.
Version 2.0 - Added destruction damage support for mod, Vampiric Blood Affinity is the new perk detailing magic damage gains (champion of night was merged into this perk), corrected display bug for vampiric unarmed damage gains.
Version 1.1 - updated boiling blood display bug from vampire states.
author: Sann
